description: Detects shell32.dll executing a DLL in a suspicious directory Author: Christian Burkard. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Shell32 DLL Execution in Suspicious Directory
query: (process.executable:*\\rundll32.exe AND process.command_line:*shell32.dll* AND process.command_line:*Control_RunDLL* AND process.command_line:(*%AppData%* OR *%LocalAppData%* OR *%Temp%* OR *\\AppData\\* OR *\\Temp\\* OR *\\Users\\Public\\*))
